# The `PredicateConstraint` Struct Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Constraint for a predicate of the form &quot;cmp Pred Op, OtherOp&quot;, where <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a> is the value the constraint applies to (the ssa.copy result). <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

Constraint for a predicate of the form &quot;cmp Pred Op, OtherOp&quot;, where <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a> is the value the constraint applies to (the ssa.copy result).
